name: Bmminer-cgminer492
body:
### Welcome to Zwilla's GitHub Pages.
Now you are able to use the worlds first cgminer 4.9.2 for Bitmaintech's  Antminer Model S9 (all batches)

### Replace Bmminer with cgminer 4.9.2
By a community project we where working for many hours/days to serve you now the world's first cgminer 4.9.2 for
Antminer S9 model. 

### How to upgrade?
* 1. download https://github.com/Zwilla/bmminer-cgminer492/blob/master/update-script/AntminerS9-Update-Bmminer.tar
* 2. open your antminer's frontpage
* 3. click on "System" and the on "upgarde"
* 4. click not on the line "restore backup" and select the above file
* 5. click on the button "upload archive" now.
* 6. get a beer and relax, within the next 25 seconds your upgrade is finished! 

### How to downgrade?
* 1. during upgrading we where creating a new option at the menun "Upgade", open this page
* 2. click on the link below (download backup)
* 3. save it to your computer and follow the steps 3-6 from "How to upgrade"


### Authors and Contributors
Miguel Padilla from Zwilla Research (Germany)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with it? Check out the community pages at [documentation](https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=post;topic=1569129) or [contact support](https://www.zwilla.de/) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
